name: Human and Robob
description:
Installation information
The Windows build should work without any problem. I have tested it on Windows 10 and 11.
For the Linux build, I can't guarantee that it will work, because I couldn't test it.

Story
In the game, you play a human who has fallen through a wormhole into another dimension. Here he meets the robot "Robob". Robob wants to help the human get back to his dimension so that he can get to his grandfather's birthday party on time. Unfortunately, Robob has lost his processors, which he needs to do the calculations for the wormhole. So the human must help him to find his lost processors.

This Game was made for the Woowie Jam 4.0
I have created this game inerhalb of three and a half for Woowie Jam 4.0. The game was programmed and developed by me. Some assets are from other people (see Credits).

Controls
Pause / Resume Game: Esc
Restart: R
Human: W A S D
Robob: Arrow keys / Buttons at the top right
Robob Place Fire: Q / Button at the top right

Credits
Music by maou --> https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-theme-1
Door Sound fx by rubberduck --> https://opengameart.org/content/100-cc0-sfx-2
Art Assets by pupkin --> https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
Buttons by aztrakatze --> https://aztrakatze.itch.io/simple-cute-robot

Have fun playing the Game :)
